programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetik Giorgio Tsoukalos heidab tagasivaatava pilgu kumnele erakordsele olendile, keda oleme uurinud - olenditele, kes võivad pakkuda veenvaid tõendeid maavalise kulaskaigu kohta.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Üle maailma on laiali salaparased varemed. Need iidsed ehitised seisavad nagu vaikivad valvurid minevikust, mille tegelik ajalugu on nailiselt aja poolt kustutatud. Kas moodne arheoloogia suudab lahendada mõistatuse, kuidas ja miks need imed ehitati?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Maksame koos pandikunnidega lõivu, kui Rick kaupleb sigarikarbi ule, mis kuulus kunagi J. F. Kennedyle. Poodi tuuakse kindral Custeri Kodusõja-aegne foto.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Poodi tuuakse Salvador Dali maal "Jumaliku komoodia" sarjast. Kas see teos avaldab Rickile surrealistlikku muljet või ta rebib selle seinalt maha?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Labi ajaloo ja kogu maailmas on olnud palju puhasid reliikviaid, millel arvatakse olevat mustilisi võimeid. Kas on võimalik, et need tavalised esemed - hammas või sõduri oda - võivad omada võimet teha imesid?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Talismanid pakuvad kaitset ja õnne. Mõne puhul arvatakse isegi, et need kehastavad kõrgemat jõudu. Kas võib olla, et see, mis toidab meie usku talismanidesse, ei ole ebausk, vaid tõeline side millegagi valjaspool meie maailma?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas uks piibli patriarh sai juhiseid 200 inglilt kõrgel maa kohal? Kas vanadele kreeklastele õpetas metalli tootlemist kalarahvas? Ja kas Egiptuse kõige vastuolulisem vaarao võis olla maavaline olend?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Chum uritab anda endast parima, kui letile pannakse Nike Lebroni tossud. Kas tuleb pealtpanek? Seejarel jalgib Rick tahelepanelikult muujat, kes saabub signeeritud Pulp Fictioni plakatiga. Kas ta suudab valja kaubelda kuninglikult hea hinna?

programme.title: Mahajaetud inseneritoo
programme.desc: Mahajaetud betoonsein. Viis kummalist mahajaetud ehitist. Kadunud põgenemistee tuumamaailmalõpust. Uputatud uhendusluli Normandia dessandiga. Kes need ehitasid? Ja miks nad huljati?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Muuja jalutab poodi, lootes teha kaupa Magic Johnsoni 50. sunnipaeva kutsega. Kas tehing paneb pealt? Chum vaatab "Pimeduse ruutlis" rekvisiitidena kasutatud jokkerikaarte. Kas ta mangib oma kaardid õigesti valja või teeb muuja trikke?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: "Iidsed tulnukad" loeb ules kumme tõenaolisemat kohta ule maailma, mis võivad varjata tulnukate baase, sealhulgas Antarktika jaa all asuv koobas, Hiinas asuv jarv, mis on UFOde lemmikpaigaks, ja puramiid Denali mae nõlvade all.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Dwight ja Tyesha komistavad animatroonilise turannosauruse otsa ja hakkavad seda tukeldama, samal ajal kui Doug haukab liialt suure suutaie, kui ta liigutab hiiglaslikku tagahoovis asuvat piraadilaeva stiilis mangumaja.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Uus ostja paneb Barry ja Jarrodi proovile ning lahkub sealt pungil tais laoga. Barry leiab aga sõiduki ning Herb ja Mike satuvad peale gaasipumbale.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad kohtuvad uute oksjonipidajatega. Darrell kaitseb oma ala. Ivy Calvin leiab tooriista, mida ta pole varem nainud. Jarrod ja Brandi peavad leidma asjad oma uude kauplusesse.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: 1698. aastal roovib kapten William Kidd avamerel uhe laeva koos selle tohutute aaretega... kuid Kidd puuakse ules enne, kui ta jõuab paljastada, kuhu saagi peitis. Mis juhtus kapten Kiddi kadunud saagiga... ja kus see nuud on?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: "Iidsed tulnukad" loeb ules kumme intrigeerivamat ja salaparasemat leitud sumbolit ja koodi, mis võivad sisaldada tõendeid kontaktist tulnukatega. Peruu kõrbes asuvatest gluufidest kuni spiraal-petrogluufideni, mis sisaldavad kõrgemat matemaatikat.

programme.title: Pandikunnid

programme.title: Pandikunnid

programme.desc: Liituge ekspertide Giorgio Tsoukalose, William Henry ja Jason Martelliga, kes alustavad ulemaailmset uurimistood, vaadates ule sarja "Iidsed tulnukad" arhiivi, et uurida kõige saladuslikumaid arheoloogilisi paiku nagu Giza, Puma Punku ja teised.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natasha kohtub võrdse vastasega, kui toimetab arcade-mange anime-konverentsile, ning Doug põrkab ninjade treeningrada transportides oma oskusi demonstreerides takistustesse.

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui meeskond viib kolmnurgas labi oma seni kõige keerulisemat eksperimenti, on nad hammastunud, kui nende silme ees toimub hulk veidraid sundmusi.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick rokib, kui uks muuja toob kohale spordijaki, mida kandis Rolling Stonesi Keith Richards. Kas ta saab rahulolu või pagendab ta jaki? Siis jõuab letile Jaapani samuraimask. Kas Chum suudab hea hinna valja hirmutada?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Juba sajandeid on uritanud arheoloogid valja selgitada, kuidas ja miks loodi teatud uskumatud ehitised nagu Giza puramiid, Loretto kabeli trepp ja Korall-loss. Kas me saame seda kunagi teada?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Milline on tõde, mis peitub hiljuti kaameraga jaadvustatud hirmsa Filipiinide olendi, Aswangi nagemise taga. Kas Saskatchewani metsades varitseb tõesti suur kuri hunt?

programme.title: Peale Skinwalkeri rantšo
programme.desc: Selles eriepisoodis vaatavad Brandon, Travis ja Erik ule missiooni esimese hooaja õppetunnid, mil Andy ja Paul kogesid kogu Ameerikas uleloomulikke nahtusi.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Inimkond on saatnud satelliite kosmosesse ja allveelaevu ookeani põhja, kuid Maa pinna all olev ala on endiselt salaparane. Kas kivikihtide alla või tohututesse koobastesse on maetud sugavad saladused?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kaevates Money Piti piirkonnas massiivses teraskaigus, teevad vennad Laginad koos meeskonnaga avastuse, mis võib aidata tõestada, et legendid maetud aarete kohta on tõesed.

programme.title: Uskumatu koos Dan Aykroydiga
programme.desc: Kujutage ette linna, kus liikumiseks on vaja liugtrossi, või linna, kus elutsevad mingid kummalised ahvid, ja isegi paika, kus on kaunis juga, mis purskab verd. Pange oma passid valmis, sest teeme ringkaigu kõige ebaharilikematesse paikadesse.

programme.title: Suureparased põgenemised koos Morgan Freemaniga
programme.desc: Ameerika-saksa piloot Dieter Dengler kasutab lapsepõlves omandatud ellujaamisoskusi, et põgeneda Vietnami sõja algusaastatel Laoses asuvast salajasest vanglast.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Juba aastakumneid on arutletud, mida UFOd endast tapselt kujutavad. Teooriate kohaselt võivad need olla mis tahes - sõjalennukitest ilmastikunahtusteni. Kõige vastuolulisema teooria jargi on tegu tulnukate kosmoselaevadega. Kas see võib tõsi olla?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Tutvume maailma kumne salaparasema saarega, mille hulgas on kohad, kus vaidetavalt elavad hiiglased, osad saared aga kaovad õhku. Kas need uskumatud paigad võivad olla tõendid maavaliste kulaskaikude kohta?

programme.title: Peale Skinwalkeri rantšo
programme.desc: Selles eriepisoodis vaatavad Brandon, Travis ja Erik ule missiooni esimese hooaja õppetunnid, mil Andy ja Paul kogesid kogu Ameerikas uleloomulikke nahtusi.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: "Iidsed tulnukad" loeb ules kumme intrigeerivamat ja salaparasemat leitud sumbolit ja koodi, mis võivad sisaldada tõendeid kontaktist tulnukatega. Peruu kõrbes asuvatest gluufidest kuni spiraal-petrogluufideni, mis sisaldavad kõrgemat matemaatikat.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Milline on tõde, mis peitub hiljuti kaameraga jaadvustatud hirmsa Filipiinide olendi, Aswangi nagemise taga. Kas Saskatchewani metsades varitseb tõesti suur kuri hunt?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Varvime linna koos pandikunnidega punaseks, kui poodi tuuakse Monet maastikumaal. Ricki ajalootund Cinco de Mayo teemal ajab mehed hulluks ja võib juhtuda, et teda ei kutsuta iseenda fiestale.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Poodi tuuakse "Space 2005" kaekell-raadio. Kas see kosmoseajastu seadeldis osutub millekski maavaliseks või kukub põrmu?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Inimkond on saatnud satelliite kosmosesse ja allveelaevu ookeani põhja, kuid Maa pinna all olev ala on endiselt salaparane. Kas kivikihtide alla või tohututesse koobastesse on maetud sugavad saladused?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kaevates Money Piti piirkonnas massiivses teraskaigus, teevad vennad Laginad koos meeskonnaga avastuse, mis võib aidata tõestada, et legendid maetud aarete kohta on tõesed.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: 1698. aastal roovib kapten William Kidd avamerel uhe laeva koos selle tohutute aaretega... kuid Kidd puuakse ules enne, kui ta jõuab paljastada, kuhu saagi peitis. Mis juhtus kapten Kiddi kadunud saagiga... ja kus see nuud on?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick rokib, kui uks muuja toob kohale spordijaki, mida kandis Rolling Stonesi Keith Richards. Kas ta saab rahulolu või pagendab ta jaki? Siis jõuab letile Jaapani samuraimask. Kas Chum suudab hea hinna valja hirmutada?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui meeskond puurib Skinwalker Ranchi kõvasse kaljumassiivi, avastavad nad salaparase tuhimiku, mis sisaldab labitungimatut objekti, mis põhjustab uhe kõige ohtlikuma ja ahvardavama sundmuse, mida nad on seni kogenud.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui Rick võtab sihikule Honus Wagneri pesapallikaardi, siis kas see on ikka ehtne vark? Chum mangib populaarse kitarrimeistri John Carruthersi ehitatud Fenderit. Kas ta suudab valida õige hinna või lõpetab nukral noodil?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Muuja jalutab poodi, lootes teha kaupa Magic Johnsoni 50. sunnipaeva kutsega. Kas tehing paneb pealt? Chum vaatab "Pimeduse ruutlis" rekvisiitidena kasutatud jokkerikaarte. Kas ta mangib oma kaardid õigesti valja või teeb muuja trikke?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.sub-title: Viis kaarti, aga ukski pole peidus
programme.desc: Rene ilmub West Covinasse, tundes end vaga nostalgiliselt ja tõstab lõpuks oma tuju. Kenny võtab sihikule "kolmerattalise" boksi ja tegeleb sellega, mis seal sees on.

programme.title: Pandikunnide Ameerika seiklus
programme.desc: Selles osas on Corey, Chum ja Rick tagasi Vegases, pakivad lahti kõik teel leitud aarded ja paljastavad mõned seni nagemata esemed. Alates rihmapannaldest Texases, elegantsete jahtideni Seattleis ja 18. sajandi pustoliteni.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastakumneid on esitatud uskumatuid vaiteid maavaliste olendite viibimisest Maal ja valitsus on teinud palju tood, et neid umber lukata. Kas lahenemas on paev, mil vilepuhujaid võetakse lõpuks tõsiselt?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad ebatavalise kunstiteose, Rene ja Casey naudivad veini ning Barry raamatupidaja uritab teda tagasi hoida.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrel ja Ivy satuvad Ivy koduvaljakul vastamisi, Barry avastab rahustava efektiga kausid ning Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad DJ varustuse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rene ja Casey leiavad Placentias asju tais hoiukapi, Barry ostab lao, mis paneb ta kahtlema oma kohas oksjonimangus ning Darrell avastab hambaarsti varustuse.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Alates iidsetest babuloonlastest kuni tanapaevaste linnade uurijateni on inimkonda alati paelunud mahajaetud kohad. Mis on see võlu, mis tõmbab meid nende postapokaluptiliste maastike poole? Morbiidne uudishimu? Või midagi raskemini maaratletavat?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Corey sõidavad klassikalise autoga Hells Chariot, mis on parit filmist "Grease". Kas leegitsev hot rod on see, mida nad tahavad, või "kukuvad" nad tehingust valja? Seejarel võtab Chum ette poksikotimangu, mida kunagi mangis Jack Dempsey.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui Oak Islandile saabub talv ja vihjeid aina ilmub, teeb vennaskond viimase julge katse aaret leida, enne kui tegevus talveks peatub.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Piloodid teatavad kohutavatest UFO-kohtumistest, sealhulgas õhusõiduki juhtimise ulevõtmisest ja reisilennukite kadumisest. Selliseid seletamatuid sundmusi on esinenud lennunduse algusest, mis paneb spekuleerima maavalise kohalolu ule me õhuruumis.

programme.title: Suureparased põgenemised koos Morgan Freemaniga
programme.desc: Ameerika-saksa piloot Dieter Dengler kasutab lapsepõlves omandatud ellujaamisoskusi, et põgeneda Vietnami sõja algusaastatel Laoses asuvast salajasest vanglast.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Eksperdid uskusid, et nad teavad, mis põhjustas Hindenburgi katastroofi, kuid selles loos võib olla rohkemat. Mis iganes plahvatuse vallandas, ei toonud hukatust mitte ainult Hindenburgile, vaid kogu tsepeliinide toostusele.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Endine vabamaadleja Ivy Calvin laheb tagasi ringi ning satub peagi silm-silma vastu Darrelliga. Jarrod ja Brandi teevad ostu ning kohtuvad uhe nohikuga.

programme.title: Pandikunnide Ameerika seiklus
programme.desc: Rick, Corey ja Chum kaivitavad mootorid ja sõidavad Detroiti, Michigani osariigis. Koos oma lemmikekspertidega riietub Rick samuraiturvisesse ja uritab luksusautode kollektsiooni hinda alla kaubelda.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad ebatavalise kunstiteose, Rene ja Casey naudivad veini ning Barry raamatupidaja uritab teda tagasi hoida.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick võitleb paari vanaaegse plakati parast, kuid kas ta võidab selle sõja? Seejarel kutsuvad Rick ja Chum appi Grayskulli, kui nad vaatavad ule suurt Battle Cati manguasja. Kas paar saab šoki kõrgest hinnast või suudab labiraakimised umber poorata?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskond jatkab liikumist mooda tunnelit, mis võib kulgeda otse aiatunneli all Baby Blobi piirkonda, kus testid naitasid suuri hõbeda ja kulla sisaldusi. Platsilt nr 5 leitud esemed viitavad tugevale seosele volitustega piraadi Sir William Phippsiga.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Juba aastakumneid on arutletud, mida UFOd endast tapselt kujutavad. Teooriate kohaselt võivad need olla mis tahes - sõjalennukitest ilmastikunahtusteni. Kõige vastuolulisema teooria jargi on tegu tulnukate kosmoselaevadega. Kas see võib tõsi olla?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kogu maailmast on leitud palju saladuslikke esemeid, mis seavad kahtluse alla kõik, mida teame oma kaugete esivanemate tehnoloogiliste võimete kohta. Kui jatkame nende esemete uurimist, kas avastame siis inimliku leidlikkuse tõelise potentsiaali?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui meeskond puurib Skinwalker Ranchi kõvasse kaljumassiivi, avastavad nad salaparase tuhimiku, mis sisaldab labitungimatut objekti, mis põhjustab uhe kõige ohtlikuma ja ahvardavama sundmuse, mida nad on seni kogenud.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Chum leiab 1920ndate aastate Baccarat pudeli Ybry parfuumi jaoks. Rick uurib pakendis "Spiderman ja Venom: Maximum Carnage" videomangu. Corey hindab 1800ndate aastate hasartmangukomplekti. Rick ja Corey uurivad Pearl Harbori runnaku automaatkahurit.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas need avastused - alates Andides peituvast kadunud linnast kuni salaparaste ebamaiste metallkeradeni ja uppunud linnani, mis vaidetavalt oli jumalate koduks - võivad olla tõendiks maavaliste kontaktide olemasolust?

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: 14. veebruaril 1929 toimub Chicagos uks šokeerivamaid mõrvu maffia ajaloos - ja see saab tuntuks valentinipaeva veresauna nime all. Kes siis teostas Valentinipaeva veresauna? Ja miks?

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Oma 500 aasta vanuste luustikesse ja kividesse peidetud saladustega on Machu Picchu uks kõige mustilisemaid arheoloogilisi paiku maailmas. See on uks iidse maailma kõige pusivamaid mõistatusi: kes ehitas selle hammastava kompleksi ja miks?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Alates iidsetest babuloonlastest kuni tanapaevaste linnade uurijateni on inimkonda alati paelunud mahajaetud kohad. Mis on see võlu, mis tõmbab meid nende postapokaluptiliste maastike poole? Morbiidne uudishimu? Või midagi raskemini maaratletavat?

programme.desc: Parast Skinwalker Ranchi lamedasse kaljusse maetud massiivsest kuplikujulisest objektist metallifragmentide leidmist viib meeskond labi teadusliku testi, mis annab šokeerivaid tulemusi.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick võitleb paari vanaaegse plakati parast, kuid kas ta võidab selle sõja? Seejarel kutsuvad Rick ja Chum appi Grayskulli, kui nad vaatavad ule suurt Battle Cati manguasja. Kas paar saab šoki kõrgest hinnast või suudab labiraakimised umber poorata?

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Many ancient civilisations foretold of the worlds end, but could these be close to the truth? And how close is the end of days?

programme.title: Templiruutlite piraadiaare
programme.desc: Scott follows the trail of the Knights Templar to Portugal, where he learns some stunning new information that breaks the investigation wide open. Barry focuses on a wreck he believes is Captain Kidds warship and makes a groundbreaking discovery.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Aphrodisias is a city of marble, dedicated to the goddess of beauty: Aphrodite. Discover how the city was forgotten and then found again in the mid-20th century.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Mother Nature unleashes a swarm of tornados on a group of storm chasers. A delivery driver in Japan gets swallowed by the deadliest tsunami in Japans history. And finally, a massive avalanche barrels into a small town in Norway.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Enter creator JRR Tolkiens fantastical world of hobbits, orcs and wizards and uncover the real life influences that shaped his epic fantasy, the Lord of the Rings.

programme.title: Mummy Forensics
programme.desc: The team examine a cross-legged Peruvian mummy. Why was it mummified in such a strange position?

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja kadunud kuld
programme.desc: Jatkub jaht uhele lahiajaloo suuremale aardele. Sari "Teise maailmasõja kadunud kuld" on tagasi, et jatkata sadu miljoneid dollareid vaart roovsaagi otsingut, mille Jaapani kindral Tomoyuki Yamashita vaidetavalt ara peitis.

programme.title: Templiruutlite kadunud jaanused
programme.desc: Carl ja Hamilton uurivad ristisõdijate mõõka ja kiivrit, mis on vanemad kui 900 aastat. Seejarel, reisides Itaalia "ujuvasse linna", saavad nad rohkem teada selle kohta, kuidas ja miks Veneetsia Puha Markuse enda kaitsepuhakuks võttis.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Area 51 is considered the ultimate top secret facility, but there is another military site, known as Area 52, where strange phenomena have been witnessed for 10 years.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: New York is one of the most man-made spaces on the planet, but everything from the height of its skyscrapers to the position of its harbour is governed by extraordinary forces.

programme.title: Impeeriumi loomine
programme.desc: For over 4000 years, the worlds greatest empires have come and gone. This series looks at the architectural triumphs of great civilizations alongside their cultural history. This episode - Greece: Age of Alexander.

programme.title: Atlantis Found
programme.desc: To confirm his theory that the mythical city of Atlantis actually existed on the Greek island of Santorini, explorer and geologist Dr. Martin Pepper sets out on an odyssey that takes us across the Mediterranean and into the Atlantic Ocean itself. Using modern science to confirm the references of the Ancients, Plato included, Dr. Pepper succeeds in recreating the look of this legendary land.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: From an obsession with silk to the fall of Constantinople, the discovery of the Americas to the launch of the Industrial Revolution, a desire for luxury has shaped our history and evolution.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: Around 10,000 years ago, humans discovered farming. But when crops failed, early farming communities faced a new threat: war. Its the birth of the arms race.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.sub-title: Ancient China: Masters of the Wind and Waves
programme.desc: Many years before modern air travel, the ancient Chinese had learned and were practising the complicated principles of fluid and aerodynamics in the kites they flew, the boats they sailed and the childrens toys they made.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Host Bobby Bognar explores Italian cuisine across the U.S., sourcing ingredients, pasta secrets in NY, vinegars, wines in CA, and dessert wisdom from NJ to Costa Rica.

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: Most compelling evidence for the creature known as Bigfoot may be the increasing close encounters that are frightening witnesses in America. Stories have told of interactions range from objects being thrown to frightening abductions by hairy beasts.

programme.title: Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is usually a one-man journey, but Wayne Tuttle is partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly-revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous buried treasure.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: Eric Geller investigates the hidden history of Rome: life under the tyranny of Emperor Nero and the reforms of Emperor Augustus.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Uurimine on paljastanud UFO-de kohta jahmatavaid videotõendeid, mustreid, salakoordinaate ja ehmatavaid pealtnagijate tunnistusi. Nuud seisneb suurim kusimus selles, kes nad on ja kas nad on ohtlikud.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Mass suicides. Human sacrifices. Unholy rituals. People have claimed to have otherworldly knowledge and have led followers to commit horrific acts of violence. Are they con men? Are they insane? Or are there extraterrestrials with a sinister agenda?

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: A bloody battle at the ancient city of Dos Pilas leads to the downfall and disappearance of this powerful pre-Columbian warrior society.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: The new series of River Hunters kicks off with an investigation into the last battle to have taken place on British soil, the battle of Culloden in 1746, on the outskirts of Britains most northerly city and capital of the Highlands, Inverness.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: The team investigates Nikola Teslas final residence, The New Yorker Hotel, and find incredible evidence that it served as much more than a home to the controversial inventor.

programme.title: Maroon 5 _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Maroon 5 featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Moves Like Jagger, Daylight, "This Love" and many more…

programme.title: Velvet Revolver - Live in Houston
programme.desc: This concert by Velvet Revolver was filmed in Houston, Texas in 2005 during the tour in support of their bestselling and Grammy Award winning debut album "Contraband". The full length live tracks are intercut with snippets of interview with the various band members talking about how Velvet Revolver came into being. The set list naturally focuses on that debut release but is complimented by two tracks from the Guns n Roses catalog and two tracks from Stone Temple Pilots debut album highlighting the history of the band members. Velvet Revolver are an outstanding live band and are on great form in front of a typically enthusiastic Texan crowd.

programme.title: Slash and Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators - Live At the Roxy
programme.desc: On September 25th 2014, shortly after the release of their "World On Fire" album, Slash with Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators took the stage at the legendary Roxy Theatre on Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The atmospheric venue, steeped in rock history, gave fans a brilliant opportunity to experience the band up close as they delivered a set packed with more recent solo tracks, including several from the new album, and classics from Slashs earlier career with Guns n Roses and Velvet Revolver. The intimate setting inspired the band to deliver a scintillating, dynamic performance that is brilliantly captured on this digital release.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Kiss - Live in Nurburgring
programme.desc: Kiss is one of the legendary groups in Hard Rock history. They have millions of fans around the world and over 100 million records sold. KISS confirms why they have been the best on the scene for nearly four decades, in a performance that made history, impressing an audience of more than 85,000 people, in a show of more than 2 hours and packed with hits, held at the Nurburgring, Germany in 2010.

programme.title: U2 - Classic Album
programme.sub-title: U2 - Classic Album: The Joshua Tree
programme.desc: The Joshua Tree was the fastest and highest selling album of 1987, representing a life affirming rebuttal of the synthesizer pop of the preceding years. Rocks DNA of blues, folk, gospel and country were he building blocks of the album, fashioned lyrically and acoustically for the 80s. U2 and their producers Brian Eno and Daniel Lanois approached the recording of the album as an experiment, using it as an opportunity for each of them to explore their own ideas, musical political and personal. This program story tells the story of that creative collision.

programme.title: Maroon 5 _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Maroon 5 featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Moves Like Jagger, Daylight, "This Love" and many more…

programme.title: Michael Bolton _ Live at the Royal Albert Hall
programme.desc: Join Michael Bolton for an unforgettable concert at Londons famous Royal Albert Hall as he delivers hit after hit in his trademark soulful style in front of a packed audience. With his inimitable voice, charismatic stage presence and superb songwriting Michael Bolton holds the audience in the palm of his hand as he performs classics such as "How Am I Supposed To Live Without You?", "Time, Love And Tenderness", "Can I Touch You There" and "How Can We Be Lovers" alongside his unique interpretations of "Fly Me To The Moon", "Summertime", "Thats Life" and "(Sittin On) The Dock Of The Bay" plus his own rendition of "Murder My Heart", the hit he co-wrote with Lady Gaga. Simply a wonderful night.

programme.title: The Beatles - Composing the Beatles Songbook
programme.desc: This independent documentary film reviews the partnership, music and impact of Lennon and McCartney as composers. From the day they met in 1957 until the release of the Rubber Soul album at the end of 1965, the film dissects and contrasts, reassesses and ultimately provides one of the finest films made about the band during this period. Drawing on rare footage, classic performances and penetrating revelations from friends of the pair, Beatles academics and musicologists, this program discovers the true story of how those classic songs were written. It features contributions from; friends Barry Miles, Klaus Voorman and Maureen Cleaves; musicians Alan Moore and Chris Ingham; journalists Robert Christgau [Village Voice] and Anthony De Curtis [Rolling Stone]; authors Johnny Rogan, Pete Doggett, Steve Turner and Nigel Williamson and broadcaster Paul Gambaccini.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Live at Tokyo Dome
programme.desc: Red Hot Chili Peppers after the return of John Frusciante, who has come to Japan for the first time in 16 years in 2023!

programme.title: The Killers - Live at Rock Am Ring
programme.desc: Rock Am Ring (Nurburgring), Rock Im Park (Nuremberg) is a music festival that takes place annually at the Nurburgring Race Track in western Germany. Featuring The Killers.

programme.title: The Lumineers - Live At Musilac
programme.desc: The Lumineers bring energetic American folk-rock to the picturesque Musilac Festival. You wont be able to resist clapping along and stomping your feet to the bands raw sound and enchanting music.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Maroon 5 _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Maroon 5 featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Moves Like Jagger, Daylight, "This Love" and many more…

programme.title: Motley Crue _ The End
programme.sub-title: Motley Crue _ The End: Live In Los Angeles
programme.desc: On January 28, 2014, Motley Crue held a press conference at Beachers Madhouse Theater in Hollywood, where they announced a final tour. The band became the first to sign a binding legal document known as a "cessation of touring" contract, preventing them from touring under the name Motley Crue past the year 2015. The tour eventually ended with three nights at the Staples Center in the bands hometown of Los Angeles on December 28, 30 and 31st of 2015. The visually stunning and final concert of Motley Crues final tour, Motley Crue: The End was captured with 30 cameras in Ultra HD 4K in front of a sold out crowd of die hard Motley Crue fans. For all of the legion of fans who were not able to experience the final concert of one of the greatest rock bands of all time, this is the ultimate chance to see the show and relive the final tour of Motley Crue.

programme.title: The Doors - Live in Europe
programme.desc: While the nails were starting to be driven into the hippie generations coffin, an L.A. band would cast an influence and signal a new movement of musical artistry that would prove to be a hard act to follow. In the late-60s, the Doors would help lead a new musical revolution that would throw a middle finger in the face of society and distance itself from all the turmoil that shaped the political climate by literally creating mass hysteria on their own. This concert, filmed in 1968 during the Bands tour across Europe, include live performances of Spanish Caravan, Five to One, and two versions of Light My Fire.

programme.title: Pharrell Williams - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Pharrell Williams performs his hits including "Marilyn Monroe", "Come Get It Bae", "Happy" and many more.

programme.title: Lady Gaga _ Live in London
programme.desc: Lady Gagas performance at the iTunes Festival in London on September 1, 2013 marks the superstars first full concert since the The Born This Way Ball. It is an eight song set containing the world premiere of seven tracks from her fourth album, ARTPOP: "Aura"; "MANiCURE"; "Artpop"; "Jewels N Drugs" ft. T.I., Too $hort and Twista; "Sexxx Dreams", "Swine"; and "I Wanna Be With You", a song that transformed into "Dope" for ARTPOP. During the concert, captured stunningly in HD, Gaga says that shes "a bit like Dorothy right now." The stage is her Kansas, the crowd is her family, and their reunion is pure magic. Lady Gaga, her dancers, and her band traverse through visual and musical themes of love, sex, violence, beauty, danger, empowerment, hustle, lust, and above all ART. Throughout, Gaga lays her heart bare for the audience and the cameras with every note sung and every word spoken.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Buddy Holly was a central figure of late 1950s, with hits, Thatll be the Day, Everyday and Peggy Sue. Holly made his second appearance on The Ed Sullivan Show in January 1958 and soon after, toured Australia and the UK. In early 1959, he assembled a new band and embarked on a tour of the midwestern U.S. After a show in Clear Lake, Iowa, he chartered an airplane to travel to his next show, in Moorhead, Minnesota. Soon after take-off, the plane crashed, killing him, Ritchie Valens and The Big Bopper, in a tragedy later referred to by Don McLean as The Day the Music Died"".

programme.title: Guns N Roses - Live From the O2 Arena London
programme.desc: Watch this mega-production of Guns N Roses performing live at the O2 Arena to its fans singing and vibrating to each song. Includes; Paradise City, Sweet Child O Mine, November Rain and many more.

programme.title: Alabama Shakes - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: Mixing classic RandB vocals with a soulful blues-rock base, Alabama Shakes have taken garage rock and turned it on its head. Alabama Shakes takes the Austin City Limits stage for the second time in support of their newest album Sound and Color.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Alice Cooper - Welcome To My Nightmare
programme.desc: This special edition documentary feature from Alice Cooper includes the 1976 concert film "Welcome To My Nightmare" and, releasing for the first time, the 1975 TV special "Alice Cooper: The Nightmare". "Alice Cooper: The Nightmare" is the rarely seen 1975 TV special that aired on ABC, in conjunction with the release of the legendary "Welcome To My Nightmare" album. The TV special stars Alice Cooper as Steven and Vincent Price as The Spirit of the Nightmare, and showcases every song from the "Welcome To My Nightmare" album, including Only Women Bleed, Department of Youth, Cold Ethyl and the title track. "Welcome To My Nightmare" features hits and classic songs, including Im Eighteen, School s Out, Only Women Bleed, No More Mr. Nice Guy and, of course, Welcome To My Nightmare. The nightmare vividly comes to life on the rock stage, bringing forth a plethora of skeletons, giant spiders, a cyclops, the "magic" movie screen and the voice of horrormeister Vincent Price, all designed to thrill you and keep you uneasy in your sleep.

programme.title: Paramore - Live at the Roundhouse
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007.

programme.title: Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood - Live from Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: History rocked and rock made history during a sold-out three-gig stand at Madison Square Garden in late February 2008 when icons Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood performed a concert together for the first time since their all-too-brief days in the legendary Blind Faith in 1969. Whether they will ever team again is unknown. But with Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood Live From Madison Square Garden fans everywhere are able to experience the sound and the glory of a performance on that famous stage by two of rocks greatest artists.

programme.title: Coldplay - SXSW - Live in Austin
programme.desc: Filmed at The Moody Theater in Austin, Texas, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Coldplay featuring unforgettable version of their hits: "Viva La Vida", "Fix You", "Clocks" and many more…

programme.title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti: Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: Rodrigo y Gabriela - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The mexican duet takes the stage at Garorock Festival, in July 2014.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Birmingham in the late 1960s was an industrial city, packed with music groups. At its height, the New Musical Express had reported 500 on its bustling circuit and from two of these groups, Black Sabbath was formed. The Beatles would be a key influence for Ozzy, but bassist Geezer Butler also shaped Ozzys work, through his lyrics After signing to Vertigo Records in 1970, the four piece used their distinctive sound to full effect for their self-titled debut album, Black Sabbath. Black Sabbath became a commercial success, entering the UK top 10 and the US charts. In its first year it sold one million copies. Keen to build on the success, the band entered the studio just four months after releasing their debut. The title track, Paranoid, would lead the new album. Featuring archive material, music videos "PARANOID" "EVIL WOMAN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: Shakira - Oral Fixation Tour
programme.desc: Oral Fixation Tour was the fourth concert tour by Colombian singer and songwriter, Shakira. It was launched in support of her sixth and seventh studio albums Fijacion Oral, Vol. 1 (2005). and Oral Fixation, Vol. 2 (2005).

programme.title: Florence And the Machine - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: The Police - Around the World
programme.desc: Around The World follows The Police on their first world tour in 1979 and 1980, as they visit 6 continents building their fanbase show-by-show, country-by-country, song-by-song. In between the performances, the film offers a jovial glimpse of the band as they travel around the world and their visits to local sights. Around The World is presented with restored picture and remastered audio, and includes complete performances of 4 songs featured in the documentary.

programme.title: BLACKPINK - The Show
programme.desc: The Show opened with "Kill This Love", following a video featuring sights of dark and empty cities around the world.[9] Apart from live performances it also included several pre-recorded tracks.[10] Each member performed their own solo stage; Jennie performed her song "Solo" with new rap lyrics written by her, and Rose shared a preview of her solo debut "Gone", while Jisoo and Lisa performed covers of Tove Los "Habits (Stay High)" and Doja Cats "Say So " respectively, both adding new self-written lyrics .

programme.title: Chic _ Live in London
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Robbie Williams - Live at the Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: A brand new show that brings a veteran artist at his best! The talented artist, who became famous in the group ""Take That"", lacks presentations, but he himself begins his show by saying: ""Let me resubmit ..."". Robbie Williams has the ability to reinvent himself, exhibiting so much energy that he seems to be a rookie artist. Already in the 40s band of pop music, Robbie is more than an artist consecrated worldwide, is a reference with hits present in the best lists of consecrated DJs. This show at the Roundhouse coincided with the announcement of their 11th solo album, Heavy Entertainment Show, just released. The new albums title reflects Williams performance as energy-dense as his 11-member big band, including his hits partner Guy Chambers on the piano. A formidable 90 minute pop odyssey. Mixing tracks from his Take That era, old or new, his songs allow him to reclaim his throne from an artist who dominates the stage - in fact, there is no one in pop music who combines his monumental energy with music Touching. A magical moment can be perceived in ""A Better Man"", only with the guitar on stage; Proof that he is an artist that goes beyond the scenery. This Blu-Ray shows the trajectory of an artist who knows how to renew himself every lap; An example for the new generations of music that are lost in appearance, forgetting the essential aspect that Robbie Williams is revealing more and more.

programme.title: The Strokes - Live at Landmark Music Festival
programme.desc: And as with other hugely successful rock bands, it was the lead singer who was in charge of pumping up the crowd, with Julian Casablancas yelling things like "D.C., lets rock!" and "Whats up, D.C.?!" The crowd went wild, but to Casablancas, it was clearly a joke. He was playing a role and said as much outright at the beginning of the show, but that didnt stop the crowd, hungry for more entertainment, from taking him seriously.

programme.title: Leon Bridges _ Live in London
programme.desc: The Apple Music Festival (formerly known as the iTunes Festival) was a music concert series held by Apple, Inc. inaugurated in 2007.

programme.title: 30 Seconds To Mars _ Live in London

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: Tanners plans for revenge take a truly dark turn at a deserted Pennsylvania hospital. Dark entities, doppelgangers and poltergeists lurk around every corner.

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: Alex breaks all the rules with his pick. He challenges the team to enter the Indiana State Sanatorium with no information about this terrifying location.

programme.title: Ghost Nation
programme.desc: The team investigate reports of a spike in paranormal activity at a Connecticut antique shop. The owner fears she may have to shut her doors for good.

programme.title: Ghost Nation

programme.desc: The near-naked corpse of an older man leads detectives on a four-state investigation, and it becomes apparent his murder was based on a terrible mistake.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Stephen and Becky Vargas appear to have it all. But behind their picture-perfect life, an unthinkable violence ends their marriage with murder.

programme.desc: When missing teenager Shafilea Ahmeds remains are found, her parents seem devastated. Years later, police unravel the truth: of abuse, family honour and murder.

programme.title: Deadliest Mums and Dads
programme.desc: When Lesley Ford and four of her children disappear from a Cornish village, her husband claims they left him without a trace. But police are suspicious.

programme.title: Deadliest Mums and Dads

programme.title: Evil Lives Here

programme.title: BTK
programme.desc: Serial killer BTK terrorised Wichita, Kansas for 30 years until his capture in 2005. Investigators, victims families and his own daughter reveal how they were affected.

programme.title: Perfektne mõrv

programme.title: I (Almost) Got Away with It
programme.desc: Michael Hess has been a wanted prison escapee for over two decades, until he makes the mistake of stealing a fake identity which alerts police and leads to his capture.

programme.title: I (Almost) Got Away with It
programme.desc: When an extremist militia group finds out one of their men has been arrested they suspect the neighbours tipped off police. Can cops stop them taking revenge?

programme.title: Death by Fame
programme.desc: The son of a powerful Hollywood player yearns to escape his dads shadow. Dark secrets come to light when a human torso turns up in a dumpster.

programme.title: Death by Fame

programme.title: Mõrvauurimine

programme.title: Abiks põhjatuule vastu
